about-section.title: Your Strategic Technology Partner
about-section.subtitle: About Us
about-section.description:
At MagicWebs, we combine creativity with cutting-edge technology to build digital solutions that transform businesses. Our approach is focused on understanding your needs and turning them into digital products that deliver real results. 
 We help growing companies with custom, scalable digital solutions built using modern technologies and best practices to maximize growth and performance.

why-us-section.title: Why Build With U
why-us-section.subtitle: Advantages
why-us-section.description: We combine experience, technology, and commitment to create digital solutions that take your business to the next level.

1.title: Modern Technology
1.description: We use the latest technologies and frameworks to ensure your project is fast, secure, and scalable.

2.title: Guaranteed Security
2.description: We implement best security practices to protect your business and your customers’ data.

3.title: Dedicated Support
3.description: Our team is available to support you every step of the way, from design to launch.

4.title: Fast Delivery
4.description: Agile methodologies allow us to deliver high-quality results within competitive timelines.

5.title: Custom Design
5.description: Every project is unique. We create custom designs that reflect your brand identity.

6.title: Results-Driven
6.description: We don’t just build websites — we create tools that generate leads and increase your sales.

service-section.title: End-to-End Digital Solutions
service-section.subtitle: Our Services
service-section.description: We offer a full range of development services to cover all your business’s digital needs.

1.title: Web Development
1.description: Corporate websites, landing pages, and web portals designed to turn visitors into customers.

2.title: E-commerce
2.description: Fully featured online stores with payment gateways, inventory management, and an optimized shopping experience.

3.title: Custom Software
3.description: Tailored systems to automate processes, including CRMs, ERPs, and enterprise solutions.

portfolio-section.title: Featured Projects
portfolio-section.subtitle: Our Work
portfolio-section.description: Explore some of our most recent projects and discover how we’ve helped our clients achieve their digital goals.

1.title: Hospitality Development
1.description: A modern hospitality website designed to showcase the hotel’s experience, highlight its services, and drive direct bookings through an intuitive and visually engaging user experience.

2.title: Tours Development
2.description: A web platform optimized to attract travelers, showcase tours, and enable direct bookings quickly and easily on any device.

faq-section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq-section.subtitle: We Answer Your Questions
faq-section.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our web development and software services.

1.Q1: How long does it take to develop a website?
1.A1: The development time varies depending on the complexity of the project. A basic informational website can be ready in 2-3 weeks, while an e-commerce site or a custom web application may take 4 to 8 weeks. During the initial consultation, we will provide you with a detailed timeline.

2.Q2: What is the approximate cost of a project?
2.A2: Each project is unique, so costs vary depending on the requirements. We offer personalized quotes with no obligation. Contact us with the details of your project, and we will send you a detailed proposal with transparent pricing.

3.Q3: Do you offer support after launch?
3.A3: Absolutely! All our projects include 30 days of free support after launch to ensure everything works perfectly. For long-term peace of mind, we also offer monthly maintenance plans with security updates, backups, and ongoing technical support.

4.Q4: Can I update my website content myself?
4.A4: Of course. We develop websites with intuitive admin panels that allow you to update text, images, and products without technical knowledge. We also provide free training so you can manage your site independently.

5.A5: Absolutely. All our developments are 100% responsive and optimized to work perfectly on computers, tablets, and smartphones. This is essential for SEO and user experience.

6.Q6: Do you include hosting and domain in the service?
6.A6: We can manage hosting and domain registration for you, or work with your current provider. We advise on the best options based on your project’s needs and budget.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.description:
**Magicwebs Development**,  located in Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco, Mexico, is responsible for the processing of the personal data you provide in accordance with applicable data protection laws.  

 The personal data we collect includes name, phone number, and email address, which are used exclusively for contact purposes, quotations, web development services, and commercial follow-up.  

This website uses analytics and tracking technologies for statistical purposes and continuous improvement, without directly identifying users.  

We implement administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access or misuse.  

You may exercise your data protection rights by contacting us at: contact@magicwebspro.com

cookie-policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie-policy.description:
This website uses cookies and similar technologies to analyze browsing behavior, collect statistical information, improve user experience, and optimize our content and services.  

Cookies are small files stored on the user’s device that allow the browser to be recognized and anonymous information to be collected.  

 By continuing to browse this website, the user agrees to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

term.title: Terms & Conditions
term.description:
Welcome to **Magicwebs Development**. By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of them, please refrain from using this website.  

 **Website use**  

 The content of this website is provided for informational and commercial purposes only. Magicwebs Development reserves the right to modify, update, or remove any content without prior notice.  

 **Services**  

  Services offered are subject to availability and to specific agreements established with each client. Use of this website does not guarantee the provision of any service. 

 ** Intellectual property **  

 All content, designs, text, logos, images, and code displayed on this website are the property of Magicwebs Development or are used with authorization and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws.  

 **Limitation of liability**  

 Magicwebs Development shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use or inability to use this website.

  ** Changes to terms **  

 Magicwebs Development reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will become effective upon publication on this website.  

 **Governing law**  

  These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws applicable in the United Mexican States. Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent courts.
